name: Spicy Brown Mustard
description: A mixture of tart mustard, spice, and heat make this mustard a perfect pairing for pastrami stacked a mile-high between a couple pieces of rye.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mustard seeds and vinegar in a small bowl or container, cover, and let soak at room temperature for 1 day.

Transfer mustard seeds and liquid to jar of a blender. Add in salt, turmeric, allspice, ginger, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Puree until smooth, adding 2 tablespoons of water at time to thin consistency as needed. Transfer to an airtight container and let rest in refrigerator for 2 to 3 days before use.
